51#ifndef AM_HAL_IOM_H
52#define AM_HAL_IOM_H

58//*****************************************************************************
59//
61//
62//*****************************************************************************
63#define IOMn(n) ((IOM0_Type*)(IOM0_BASE + (n * (IOM1_BASE - IOM0_BASE))))
64
65//
66// Maximum time to wait for hardware to finish a blocking transaction
67// This is an escape to allow for bailing out in case of faulty peripheral
68// (e.g. a device pulling the I2C clock low)
69//
70#define AM_HAL_IOM_MAX_BLOCKING_WAIT 500000 // 0.5 sec
71
72//
73// AM_HAL_IOM_CQ=1 will use the Command Queue in nonblocking transfers.
74// 0 uses plain DMA (w/o CQ) in nonblocking transfers.
75// This should be enabled only for A1 silicon.
76//
77#define AM_HAL_IOM_CQ 1
78
79// Size guideline for allocation of application supploed buffers
80#define AM_HAL_IOM_CQ_ENTRY_SIZE (24 * sizeof(uint32_t))
81#define AM_HAL_IOM_HIPRIO_ENTRY_SIZE (8 * sizeof(uint32_t))
82
83#define AM_HAL_IOM_SC_CLEAR(flag) ((flag) << 16)
84#define AM_HAL_IOM_SC_SET(flag) ((flag))
85
86// For IOM - Need to Clear the flag for unpausing
87#define AM_HAL_IOM_SC_UNPAUSE(flag) AM_HAL_IOM_SC_CLEAR(flag)
88#define AM_HAL_IOM_SC_PAUSE(flag) AM_HAL_IOM_SC_SET(flag)
89
90// Use this macro to directly control the flags
91#define AM_HAL_IOM_SETCLR(iom, scVal) \
92 do { \
93 IOMn((iom))->CQSETCLEAR = (scVal); \
94 } while (0);
95
96// Flags 5, 7 & 6 are reserved by HAL
97#define AM_HAL_IOM_PAUSE_FLAG_RESV (IOM0_CQPAUSEEN_CQPEN_SWFLAGEN7 | IOM0_CQPAUSEEN_CQPEN_SWFLAGEN6 | IOM0_CQPAUSEEN_CQPEN_SWFLAGEN5)
98#define AM_HAL_IOM_SC_RESV_MASK (AM_HAL_IOM_PAUSE_FLAG_RESV | (AM_HAL_IOM_PAUSE_FLAG_RESV << 8) | (AM_HAL_IOM_PAUSE_FLAG_RESV << 16))
99
100
101// We use SWFLAGEN7 to control SW pausing Command Queue - default unPause
102// We use SWFLAGEN6 to pause on the sequece loopback - default Pause
103#define AM_HAL_IOM_PAUSE_FLAG_IDX (_VAL2FLD(IOM0_CQPAUSEEN_CQPEN, IOM0_CQPAUSEEN_CQPEN_IDXEQ))
104#define AM_HAL_IOM_PAUSE_FLAG_CQ (_VAL2FLD(IOM0_CQPAUSEEN_CQPEN, IOM0_CQPAUSEEN_CQPEN_SWFLAGEN7))
105#define AM_HAL_IOM_PAUSE_FLAG_SEQLOOP (_VAL2FLD(IOM0_CQPAUSEEN_CQPEN, IOM0_CQPAUSEEN_CQPEN_SWFLAGEN6))
106#define AM_HAL_IOM_PAUSE_FLAG_BLOCK (_VAL2FLD(IOM0_CQPAUSEEN_CQPEN, IOM0_CQPAUSEEN_CQPEN_SWFLAGEN5))
107
108// By default - we Pause CQ for no more entries, or force pause from SW
109#define AM_HAL_IOM_PAUSE_DEFAULT AM_HAL_IOM_PAUSE_FLAG_IDX
110#define AM_HAL_IOM_CQP_PAUSE_DEFAULT (AM_HAL_IOM_PAUSE_FLAG_IDX | AM_HAL_IOM_PAUSE_FLAG_CQ)
111

117typedef enum
118{
120 AM_HAL_IOM_ERR_INVALID_OPER = AM_HAL_STATUS_MODULE_SPECIFIC_START,
122 AM_HAL_IOM_ERR_I2C_ARB,
124 AM_HAL_IOM_ERR_I2C_NAK,
125} am_hal_iom_err_e;

135#define AM_HAL_IOM_MAX_TXNSIZE_I2C 512
136#define AM_HAL_IOM_MAX_CS_SPI 3

293//
294// transfer structure
295//
296typedef struct
297{
298 union
299 {
300 //
302 //
303 uint32_t ui32SpiChipSelect;
304 uint32_t ui32I2CDevAddr;
305 } uPeerInfo;
306
307 //
309 //
310 uint32_t ui32InstrLen;
311
312 //
314 //
315 uint32_t ui32Instr;
316
317 //
319 //
320 uint32_t ui32NumBytes;
321
322 //
324 //
325 am_hal_iom_dir_e eDirection;
326
327 //
329 //
330 uint32_t *pui32TxBuffer;
331 uint32_t *pui32RxBuffer;
332
333 //
335 //
336 bool bContinue;
337
338 //
340 //
341 uint8_t ui8RepeatCount;
342
343 //
345 //
346 uint8_t ui8Priority;
347
349 //
350 uint32_t ui32PauseCondition;
352 uint32_t ui32StatusSetClr;
353
354} am_hal_iom_transfer_t;
355
356typedef struct

362 uint32_t ui32StatusSetClr;
363} am_hal_iom_seq_end_t;

371#define AM_HAL_IOM_DCX_INVALID 0xFF
372typedef struct
373{
374 uint8_t cs;

389} am_hal_iom_cq_raw_t;

391typedef enum
392{
395 AM_HAL_IOM_REQ_FLAG_SETCLR = 0,
397 AM_HAL_IOM_REQ_SPI_LSB,
399 AM_HAL_IOM_REQ_RESV1,
401 AM_HAL_IOM_REQ_SPI_RDTHRESH,
403 AM_HAL_IOM_REQ_SPI_WRTHRESH,
406 AM_HAL_IOM_REQ_PAUSE,
409 AM_HAL_IOM_REQ_UNPAUSE,
412 AM_HAL_IOM_REQ_SET_SEQMODE,
414 AM_HAL_IOM_REQ_SEQ_END,
418 AM_HAL_IOM_REQ_INIT_HIPRIO,
421 AM_HAL_IOM_REQ_START_BLOCK,
423 AM_HAL_IOM_REQ_END_BLOCK,
426 AM_HAL_IOM_REQ_SET_DCX,
429 AM_HAL_IOM_REQ_CQ_RAW,
430 AM_HAL_IOM_REQ_MAX
431} am_hal_iom_request_e;
432
433#define am_hal_iom_buffer(A) \
434union \
435{ \
436 uint32_t words[(A + 3) >> 2]; \
437 uint8_t bytes[A]; \
438}

455#define AM_HAL_IOM_48MHZ 48000000
456#define AM_HAL_IOM_24MHZ 24000000
457#define AM_HAL_IOM_16MHZ 16000000
458#define AM_HAL_IOM_12MHZ 12000000
459#define AM_HAL_IOM_8MHZ 8000000
460#define AM_HAL_IOM_6MHZ 6000000
461#define AM_HAL_IOM_4MHZ 4000000
462#define AM_HAL_IOM_3MHZ 3000000
463#define AM_HAL_IOM_2MHZ 2000000
464#define AM_HAL_IOM_1_5MHZ 1500000
465#define AM_HAL_IOM_1MHZ 1000000
466#define AM_HAL_IOM_750KHZ 750000
467#define AM_HAL_IOM_500KHZ 500000
468#define AM_HAL_IOM_400KHZ 400000
469#define AM_HAL_IOM_375KHZ 375000
470#define AM_HAL_IOM_250KHZ 250000
471#define AM_HAL_IOM_125KHZ 125000
472#define AM_HAL_IOM_100KHZ 100000
473#define AM_HAL_IOM_50KHZ 50000
474#define AM_HAL_IOM_10KHZ 10000
475
477#define AM_HAL_IOM_MAX_FREQ AM_HAL_IOM_48MHZ

480//*****************************************************************************
481//
482// IOM Interrupts
483//
484//*****************************************************************************
485#define AM_HAL_IOM_INT_CQERR IOM0_INTEN_CQERR_Msk
486#define AM_HAL_IOM_INT_CQUPD IOM0_INTEN_CQUPD_Msk
487#define AM_HAL_IOM_INT_CQPAUSED IOM0_INTEN_CQPAUSED_Msk
488#define AM_HAL_IOM_INT_DERR IOM0_INTEN_DERR_Msk
489#define AM_HAL_IOM_INT_DCMP IOM0_INTEN_DCMP_Msk
490#define AM_HAL_IOM_INT_ARB IOM0_INTEN_ARB_Msk
491#define AM_HAL_IOM_INT_STOP IOM0_INTEN_STOP_Msk
492#define AM_HAL_IOM_INT_START IOM0_INTEN_START_Msk
493#define AM_HAL_IOM_INT_ICMD IOM0_INTEN_ICMD_Msk
494#define AM_HAL_IOM_INT_IACC IOM0_INTEN_IACC_Msk
495#define AM_HAL_IOM_INT_NAK IOM0_INTEN_NAK_Msk
496#define AM_HAL_IOM_INT_FOVFL IOM0_INTEN_FOVFL_Msk
497#define AM_HAL_IOM_INT_FUNDFL IOM0_INTEN_FUNDFL_Msk
498#define AM_HAL_IOM_INT_THR IOM0_INTEN_THR_Msk
499#define AM_HAL_IOM_INT_CMDCMP IOM0_INTEN_CMDCMP_Msk
500
501
502#define AM_HAL_IOM_INT_SWERR (AM_HAL_IOM_INT_ICMD | AM_HAL_IOM_INT_IACC | AM_HAL_IOM_INT_FOVFL | AM_HAL_IOM_INT_FUNDFL)
503#define AM_HAL_IOM_INT_I2CARBERR (AM_HAL_IOM_INT_ARB)
504#define AM_HAL_IOM_INT_INTERR (AM_HAL_IOM_INT_CQERR | AM_HAL_IOM_INT_DERR)
505#define AM_HAL_IOM_INT_ALL 0xFFFFFFFF
506//
508//
509#define AM_HAL_IOM_INT_ERR (AM_HAL_IOM_INT_SWERR | AM_HAL_IOM_INT_I2CARBERR | AM_HAL_IOM_INT_INTERR | AM_HAL_IOM_INT_NAK)

Functions for interfacing with the M4F system control registers.
